\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{sagetex}

\begin{document}

\begin{sageblock}
  f(x) = x^2 * exp(x)
\end{sageblock}

The second derivative of $f$ is

\[
  \frac{\mathrm{d}^{2}}{\mathrm{d}x^{2}} \sage{f(x)} =
  \sage{diff(f, x, 2)(x)}.
\]

Here's a plot of $f$ from $-1$ to $1$:

\sageplot[width=4in]{plot(f, -1, 1)}

\end{document}
